# [Interview #75: ACOS Signing Report - Erica Sadun, Entry #47](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=75#47)

#### [Robert Jordan (10 October 1996)](http://groups.google.com/group/rec.arts.sf.written.robert-jordan/msg/d0c3018d65e7f283)

RJ said specifically:

• no channeling necessary to become Dreadlord

• True Power independent of One Power
